}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :OEM: [[Senao]] (7016A019304b)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Ralink]] RT2880F [[MIPS 4KEc]] @266MHz *Storage: 8MB Flash *Memory: 32MB (SDR) DRAM *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn *Network: 1x GbE ports *Power: 12V/1A via barrel or 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== :[https://pakedge.com/media/docs/press-releases/2014-2003/pak-2010-09-16-wap-w3n-pr.pdf Press Release]
